description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国黑龙江省绥化市下辖的县，王悦华的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Suihua City, Heilongjiang Province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Wang Yuehua.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团在黑龙江省的省级组织。
description.en: The provincial-level organization of the Communist Youth League of China in Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国黑龙江省鸡西市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Jixi City, Heilongjiang Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在鹤岗市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Hegang City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国黑龙江省鹤岗市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Hegang City, Heilongjiang Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国建设部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国建设部
en: Ministry of Construction of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门，主管建设行政事务。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for construction administration.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国黑龙江省的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Heilongjiang Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华全国总工会在黑龙江省的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions in Heilongjiang Province.

nodes.id: 中国工会第十五次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国工会第十五次全国代表大会
en: 15th National Congress of Chinese Trade Unions

description.zh-cn: 中国工会全国代表大会，于2008年10月17日在北京开幕。
description.en: The National Congress of Chinese Trade Unions, which opened in Beijing on October 17, 2008.

nodes.id: 中国工会第十五次全国代表大会主席团

zh-cn: 中国工会第十五次全国代表大会主席团
en: Presidium of the 15th National Congress of Chinese Trade Unions

description.zh-cn: 中国工会第十五次全国代表大会期间的领导机构。
description.en: The leading body during the 15th National Congress of Chinese Trade Unions.

nodes.id: 中共黑龙江省纪委监委

zh-cn: 中共黑龙江省纪委监委

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会与黑龙江省监察委员会的合署办公机构，负责党纪和政务监察。
description.en: The combined office of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection and the Heilongjiang Provincial Supervisory Commission, responsible for party discipline and government supervision.

description.zh-cn: 王悦华是黑龙江望奎人。
description.en: Wang Yuehua is from Wangkui, Heilongjiang.

description.zh-cn: 1983年任共青团黑龙江省委副书记，1985年升任书记。
description.en: In 1983, he became the Deputy Secretary of the Heilongjiang Provincial Committee of the Communist Youth League, and was promoted to Secretary in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 1987年至1992年，任鸡西市人民政府副市长。
description.en: From 1987 to 1992, he served as the Deputy Mayor of the Jixi Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 1992年至1996年，任中共鹤岗市委副书记。
description.en: From 1992 to 1996, he served as the Deputy Secretary of the CPC Hegang Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1992年至1996年，任鹤岗市市长。
description.en: From 1992 to 1996, he served as the Mayor of Hegang.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国建设部

description.zh-cn: 1996年至1998年，任中华人民共和国建设部市长培训中心主任。
description.en: From 1996 to 1998, he served as the Director of the Mayor Training Center of the Ministry of Construction of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1998年至2003年，任黑龙江省人民政府省长助理。
description.en: From 1998 to 2003, he served as the Assistant to the Governor of the Heilongjiang Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 自2003年起，任黑龙江省总工会主席。
description.en: Since 2003, he has served as the Chairman of the Heilongjiang Provincial Federation of Trade Unions.

relationships.target: 中国工会第十五次全国代表大会主席团

description.zh-cn: 2008年10月，在中国工会第十五次全国代表大会上当选为主席团委员。
description.en: In October 2008, he was elected as a member of the Presidium at the 15th National Congress of Chinese Trade Unions.

relationships.source: 中共黑龙江省纪委监委

description.zh-cn: 2024年3月，王悦华因涉嫌严重违法违纪，被中共黑龙江省纪委监委立案调查。
description.en: In March 2024, Wang Yuehua was placed under investigation by the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision for suspected serious violations of law and discipline.
